p: Reagents used in the present study included the following: RPMI 1640 (Rosewell Park Memorial Institute) medium (from Gibco), phosphate buffer saline (from PBS-Sigma), Pen-strep (Penicillin–Streptomycin Antibiotic, (from Gibco), fungizone (from Gibco), fetus bovine serum (from FBS-Gibco), MTT (3-(4, 5)-dimethylthiahiazo (-z-y-l)-2, 5-diphenyltetrazoliumbromide), DMSO (Dimethyl Sulfoxide), Tamoxifen, and trypsin with phenolic red (with 0.05–0.25%) (from Gibco).
